about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The address of trust in construction for 20 years
about.storyText: Aryap Construction & Real Estate was founded in Eskisehir in 2005. Since its establishment, our company has been guided by the principles of quality, trust, and innovation, becoming one of the leading construction companies in Eskisehir and Bursa for residential, commercial, and mixed-use projects.
about.storyText2: With our strong engineering infrastructure, experienced team, and vision for modern technology, we aim for the highest standards in every project.
about.valueQualityDesc: Pursuit of excellence in every detail
